thread.title: 99-year-old woman checks 'getting arrested by the feds' off her bucket list
thread.title_full: 99-year-old woman checks 'getting arrested by the feds' off her bucket list

author: Joseph Earp
title: 99-year-old woman checks 'getting arrested by the feds' off her bucket list
text:
99-year-old woman checks 'getting arrested by the feds' off her bucket list 0 By Joseph Earp 2017-02-27 23:48:32 UTC 
Most people's bucket lists don't get much more complicated than hitting a tropical destination, or maybe jumping out of a plane. 
But 99-year-old Dutch woman Annie is not like most of us. Her lifelong wish? To get herself arrested. SEE ALSO: Researchers built an origami-inspired bulletproof shield to protect police officers 
In anticipation of hitting her 100th birthday, the Nijmegen-Zuid resident and her niece hit up the police station, requesting to be put behind bars. As the ABC reports , Annie has long wanted to "experience a police cell from within." 
She certainly looks like she's having a great time in the photos police officers posted to their Facebook page. 
A spokesperson from the police station told Buzzfeed they picked her up at place in a cop car, before locking her up briefly. "We don't usually do this, but we made an exception for Annie," they said. "It was just a couple of minutes in the cell ... We don't know why it was on her bucket list." 
Bless you Annie, and long may you run from the law.
